member.name: T:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.BarcodeUtil
member.summary: Base interface used for drawing a barcode.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.BarcodeUtil.AddChecksum
member.summary: Gets or sets whether a checksum should be generated and attached to the value to encode.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.BarcodeUtil.DisplayChecksum
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the checksum value should be displayed after the value to encode in the barcode image.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.BarcodeUtil.AntiAlias
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether AntiAlias effect should be applied to all the text in the barcode image.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.BarcodeUtil.Height
member.summary: Get or set the barcode image height if the AutoSize property is set to false.
member.exception: If the specified Height is invalid.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.BarcodeUtil.Width
member.summary: Get or set the width of the barcode image if the AutoSize property is set to false.
member.exception: If the specified Width is invalid.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.BarcodeUtil.TopMargin
member.summary: Get or set the height of the margin above the barcode bars.
member.exception: If the specified TopMargin is invalid.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.BarcodeUtil.BottomMargin
member.summary: Gets or Sets the margin below the barcode bars.
member.exception: If the specified BottomMargin is invalid.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.BarcodeUtil.BarWidthAdjustment
member.summary: Gets or sets the bar width adjustment.
member.exception: If the specified BarWidthAdjustment is invalid.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.BarcodeUtil.DisplayHumanReadableText
member.summary: Get or set the Human Readable Text to be displayed instead of the value to encode specified in the ValueToEncode property.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.BarcodeUtil.HIBCFormattedHumanReadableText
member.summary: Get or set whether the Human Readable Text is formatted as specified by HIBC standards.
member.remarks: Zeros are displayed as Slashed-Zeros and the space character is displayed as an underscore.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.BarcodeUtil.BackColor
member.summary: Gets or Sets the background color.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.BarcodeUtil.Font
member.summary: Get or set the Font object used when rendering Code and Human Readable text.

member.summary: Get or set the text color to use when rendering Code and Human Readable text.

member.summary: Gets or Sets the bars height.

member.summary: Draws the selected barcode symbology into a user defined rectangle.

If an error occurs while rendering the barcode image.

member.name: T:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.CodePDF417Util
member.summary: Interface used to configure and draw a PDF417 barcode.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.CodePDF417Util.AspectRatio
member.summary: Gets or Sets the ratio of the height to the overall width.
member.exception: If the specified AspectRatio is invalid.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.CodePDF417Util.Columns
member.summary: Gets or Sets the number of columns to use.
member.exception: If the specified Columns is invalid.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.CodePDF417Util.FileID
member.summary: Gets or Sets the File ID of the Macro PDF417 symbol.
member.remarks: Value must be a sequence of codewords (each value between 0 and 899) and must be the same for all data segments.
member.exception: If the specified FileID is invalid.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.CodePDF417Util.Rows
member.summary: Gets or Sets the number of rows to use.
member.exception: If the specified Rows is invalid.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.CodePDF417Util.SegmentCount
member.summary: Gets or Sets the number of Macro PDF417 symbols.
member.remarks: Value must be less than or equal to 99999.
member.exception: If the specified SegmentCount is invalid.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.CodePDF417Util.SegmentIndex
member.summary: Gets or Sets the Segment Index for a Macro PDF417 symbol.
member.remarks: Value must be 0 to 99998 and less than the value of the SegmentCount property.
member.exception: If the specified SegmentIndex is invalid.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.CodePDF417Util.Truncated
member.summary: Gets or Sets whether the right side of the barcode is removed.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.CodePDF417Util.CompactionType
member.summary: Gets or Sets the Compaction type to apply.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.CodePDF417Util.ErrorCorrectionLevel
member.summary: Gets or Sets the error correction level to apply.

member.name: T:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.BarcodeRotationType
member.summary: Specifies the rotation of the barcode.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.BarcodeRotationType.None
member.summary: No rotation.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.BarcodeRotationType.Degree90
member.summary: 90 degree rotation.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.BarcodeRotationType.Degree180
member.summary: 180 degree rotation.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.BarcodeRotationType.Degree270
member.summary: 270 degree rotation.

member.name: T:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.CharacterSet
member.summary: The character set to use with the Code128 barcode symbology.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.CharacterSet.Auto
member.summary: Automatically switch between code sets to encode the ASCII values.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.CharacterSet.A
member.summary: Utilize Char Set A which only supports ASCII values from 0 to 95.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.CharacterSet.B
member.summary: Utilize Char Set B which only supports ASCII values from 32 to 127.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.CharacterSet.C
member.summary: Utilize Char Set C which only supports pairs of digits.

member.name: T:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.CompactionType
member.summary: Specifies the Compaction Type to apply for PDF417 symbology.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.CompactionType.Auto
member.summary: Switch between text, binary and numeric modes in order to minimize the number of codewords to be encoded.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.CompactionType.Binary
member.summary: Allows encoding all 256 possible 8-bit byte values. This includes all ASCII characters value from 0 to 127 inclusive and provides for international character set support.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.CompactionType.Text
member.summary: Allows encoding all printable ASCII characters, i.e. values from 32 to 126 inclusive in accordance with ISO/IEC 646, as well as selected control characters such as TAB (horizontal tab ASCII 9), LF (NL line feed, new line ASCII 10) and CR (carriage return ASCII 13).

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.CompactionType.Numeric
member.summary: It allows encoding numeric data strings.

member.name: T:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.PDF417ErrorCorrectionLevel
member.summary: Specifies the Error Correction Level to apply to the PDF417 symbology.

member.summary: Level 0.

member.summary: Level 1.

member.summary: Level 2.

member.summary: Level 3.

member.summary: Level 4.

member.summary: Level 5.

member.summary: Level 6.

member.name: T:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.QREncodingType
member.summary: Specifies the QRCode encoding type to use.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.QREncodingType.Auto
member.summary: Attempt to determine encoding type automatically.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.QREncodingType.Numeric
member.summary: Used to encode data that mainly contains numeric characters.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.QREncodingType.AlphaNumeric
member.summary: Used to encode data that mainly contains alphanumeric characters.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.QREncodingType.Kanji
member.summary: Used to encode data that mainly contains Kanji characters.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.QREncodingType.Byte
member.summary: Used to encode 8 bit values.

member.name: T:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.QRErrorCorrectionLevel
member.summary: Specifies the Error Correction Level to apply to the QRCode symbology.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.QRErrorCorrectionLevel.L
member.summary: Approx. 7% of codewords can be restored. Error correction level L is appropriate for high symbol quality and/or the need for the smallest possible symbol.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.QRErrorCorrectionLevel.M
member.summary: Approx. 15% of codewords can be restored. Level M is described as Standard level and offers a good compromise between small size and increased reliability.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.QRErrorCorrectionLevel.Q
member.summary: Approx. 25% of codewords can be restored. Level Q is a High reliability level and suitable for more critical or poor print quality applications.

member.name: F:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.QRErrorCorrectionLevel.H
member.summary: Approx. 30% of codewords can be restored. Level H offers the maximum achievable reliability.

member.name: T:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.Barcode.Enumerations.SupplementType
member.summary: Specifies the supplement type to use with the EAN barcode.

member.name: T:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.ZebraGraphics
member.summary: Interface for Zebra card printer graphics.

member.name: M:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.ZebraGraphics.Initialize(System.Int32,System.Int32,Zebra.Sdk.Card.Enumerations.OrientationType,Zebra.Sdk.Card.Enumerations.PrintType,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color})
member.summary: Initializes the drawing surface.
member.remarks: If the specified maxWidth or maxHeight is 0 then the maximum values for the specified printer model will be used.
member.param: The maximum width of the image. (limited based on printer model)
The maximum height of the image. (limited based on printer model)
The type of print to be performed.
The background fill color. (default is White or 0xffffff)
member.exception: If there is an error with the provided arguments.
If an error occurs initializing the graphics objects.

member.summary: Generates the final bitmap image.

member.returns: Instance containing the bitmap image data.
member.exception: If an error occurs while rendering the image.

member.summary: Gets or sets the quality of the text rendering.
member.remarks: must be called prior to setting this value.

member.summary: Gets or sets the quality of the graphics rendering.
member.remarks: must be called prior to setting this value.

member.name: P:Zebra.Sdk.Card.Graphics.ZebraGraphics.TextContrast
member.summary: Gets or sets the gamma correction level used for rendering text.
member.remarks: Value must be between 0 and 12. The default value is 4.
